text: anal, evarkal iman kontu, (salihana) narceyalkal ceytu allahvai atikamaka tiyanam ceytu (tankalukku) aniyayam ceyyappatta pinnar (atarkaka) palitirttuk kontarkalo avarkalait tavira (marravarkal kurravalikaltam) aniyayam ceytavarkal, tankal enku tirumpac cellaventu menpataiyum tittamaka(p pinnar) arintu kolvarkal
